lines: Uhh, and you see a long snout with a, uh, black nose and it’s kind of a cute furry face, uh, but in its mouth you can see a uh, a row of surprisingly sharp, kind of un-adorable teeth, and she says

speaker: Hurley
lines: I’m not one hundred percent sure why you requested the mongoose but, um, heeere it- here it is. Um.

speaker: Taako
lines: It fits perfectly!

speaker: Magnus
lines: Yeah, it makes a lot of sense. I get that.

speaker: Hurley
lines: Seriousl-- Can I ask? Grizzly bear I get for this big, beefy man beef here but... why the mongoose?

speaker: Taako
lines: Because um, the mongoose has specialized acetylcholine receptors that make it impervious to venom and so they’re known for killing snakes. Very surprisingly dangerous, like you know? Rikki-Tikki- Tavi. You know? You know not everything has to be a joke. [Clint laughs] Sometimes you just be honest about your feelings [Background laughter intensifies and continues throughout] and that’s how I see myself, you know? I may not be the most threatening silhouette, but I like to think of myself as somebody who can stand up for- You know, it doesn’t always have to be goof-goof dildo machines over here, okay? I’m travelling around with the boner squad, and I never get to just say what I’m feeling. I have emotions!

speaker: Magnus
lines: Cast calm emotions, quick!

speaker: Taako
lines: It’s not all abraca-fuck you and what have you. I have a beating heart! I’m multidimensional! I’m a fully realized creation! FUCK!

speaker: Griffin
lines: This whole- this whole speech is coming from inside this mongoose mask which really intensifies how dramatic it is. Uh, and she-

speaker: Clint
lines: Oh god.

speaker: Griffin
lines: She says, uh;

speaker: Hurley
lines: Merle, here’s yours.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh, and slides the box across the table to you, and you open it up and you see two giant yellow eyes inside looking back at you, uh, surrounded by white feathers and a rugged-looking, uh, cracked yellow beak. Uh, and she says

speaker: Hurley
lines: The owl, a symbol of wisdom, and also they can barf up whole mice skeletons.

speaker: Magnus
lines: Just like you.

speaker: Merle
lines: Exactly.

speaker: Hurley
lines: Listen, you’re not the only one who knows about animal stuff, Taakooo.

speaker: Taako
lines: Mmkay.

speaker: Magnus
lines: It’s called the bolus.

speaker: Hurley
lines: It’s called the- I know it’s called the bo-lus! Mag-nuus.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh, yeah, so so, your mongoose mask, Taako, fits really well. Surprisingly you can see out of the little beady eyes, um, really nicely, same goes for you, uh, uh, Merle, with your owl mask.

speaker: Clint
lines: You sure it’s not a little too small like my head’s too fat or anything like that?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Ah, no, she- she- she tailored this real nice for you.

speaker: Clint
lines: Okay, alright.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Um, uh, she uh, she says

speaker: Hurley
lines: Well I’m out of presents so I’d like to move onto the next scene. Um.

speaker: Travis
lines: [laughs] Star wipe!

speaker: Griffin
lines: The three of you- the three of you try on your different kit, she takes you over to the wagon, shows you your positions.

speaker: Travis
lines: Griffin, are we montaging?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, we’re montaging. Y- you-

speaker: Travis
lines: Yes!

speaker: Griffin
lines: You put on your masks, uh, this- this will be fun. I don’t know if we’ve ever done a montage before.

speaker: Clint
lines: [begins humming “Rocky” theme “Gonna Fly Now”]

speaker: Griffin
lines: Merle, you are gonna be riding shotgun, with your, uh, your big ol’-

speaker: Clint
lines: Shotgun!

speaker: Griffin
lines: -uh, big ol’ spanner. Imagine, I’m trying to give you an idea of the proportions of the car, imagine, like, the- the Death Proof muscle car, like a- like a long- like a long, uh, uh, Challenger, like, a flat hood pretty wide back end, big ol’ covered roof, um, so you’re going to be riding shotgun. Merle, there’s like a little, uh, component in the center of the car where like the backseat would be, where the harpoon cannon is mounted, so you’ll be sort of poking out, like, peeking out above the roof.

speaker: Travis
lines: Wait, you mean Taako?

speaker: Griffin
lines: Taako, yeah, sorry. Merle, you’re- you’re riding shotgun. Uh, and Magnus, uh, there are, uh, two rails running along the back, top and front of the car just like, two rails, you’re going to be strapped into those, in your harness.

speaker: Travis
lines: Yes.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh, able to sort of move throughout the length of the car. There’s also a handle, on the back of the car, the roof of the car and the hood of the car for you to hold onto, if things get hairy.

speaker: Travis
lines: Yeess!

speaker: Griffin
lines: And she is going to-

speaker: Travis
lines: YEESSSSSSS!!

speaker: Griffin
lines: She’s going to be driving the car. Uh, does that all make sense?

speaker: Travis
lines: Yes.

lines: Where am I?

speaker: Clint
lines: Yeeesss.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You’re-

lines: Where’s Taako?

speaker: Griffin
lines: You’re in the, uh the gunner compartment, sort of in the center of the car, poking out of the back seat through the roof.

speaker: Justin
lines: That’s cool.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Do you not like that?

speaker: Justin
lines: No, it’s fine.

speaker: Clint
lines: It’s kind of a whack-a-mole kind of-

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah.

speaker: Justin
lines: I’m into it.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Alright, uh, so- so, you spend the evening- well, it’s your montage, what do you- how do you spend your evening?

lines: I mean, is there anything that will increase our proficiency? Like, because this is a montage right? It’s not just stuff that we ourselves could learn so is there, like-

lines: Is this? --

lines: Are we, you know what I’m saying? Are we learning anything?

lines: Yeah, is there stuff I can put on my boots to help me get traction on top of the car and stuff like that?

lines: No, do you still have your infinite heavy bean? I don’t think you do.

lines: My infinite heavy bean? I can’t remember what happened in past episodes, I’m not a machine.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Uh, no, you do not. It’s- it’s- it’s- I mean, it’s more like, a summer vacation montage? and less like a Rocky training montage. It’s- it’s more like, a uh, Camp Nowhere thing.

speaker: Justin
lines: Now could I take this opportunity to unlearn spells and-

speaker: Griffin
lines: Oh yeah, this is- this is going to be a long ass- this is a long-ass break. You guys are starting from zero, uh, cause you’re, wait a minute I don’t wanna give out any spoilers but you’re going to need all the health and magic you can get.

lines: Uh, no.

speaker: Travis
lines: [Sigh]

lines: Again, Camp Nowhere.

lines: So is this- are we training, or are we...?

lines: For god’s sake no, you’re jumping on the blob on the lake and sending each other flying and you’re having an ice cream party!

lines: Okay, all right. [Singing] We had joy, we had fun, we ha-

lines: No-

lines: Breakfast!

lines: [singing] Morning has broken!-

lines: There is an egg sizzling in a pan.

lines: Oh, we- we got a Rube Goldberg Machine to make breakfast, we switch it on and-

lines: Do do dodo do.

lines: Good morning, Conky!

lines: In fact you you didn’t get any sleep last night, um, actually no wait, you did because you had a long rest.

lines: Why did we montage so hard.

speaker: Griffin
lines: You montaged so hard, in lieu of a long rest, you montaged. You all drove your- your battlewagon, uh, out into the desert to a predetermined spot before the sun even rises, uh, and uh, you see a large crate in the distance on wheels and there’s uh, a pit crew of goblins sort of watching over the crate, sort of motioning, uh, uh, Hurley inside and she drives into the crate and the door behind you, uh, lifts up and closes, so you are inside this crate. Um, she says, uh

speaker: Hurley
lines: This is another sort of security precaution. It also helps keep things fair because you can’t really scout out the other- the other vehicles that we’re going to be going up against today, um, listen-

speaker: Griffin
lines: So- so you spend about a half hour in there, moving hither- hither and yon.

speaker: Travis
lines: Sweating our balls off.

speaker: Griffin
lines: Yeah, it’s sweltering, it is- it is extremely, extremely hot. Surprisingly, your masks are nice and cool. You’re not sure what material they’re made out of, uh, they- they seem to be keeping you dry, perspiration free.

speaker: Clint
lines: So nothing like the Cowabunga costume?

speaker: Griffin
lines: No, nothing like the costume that we all at some point in our lives wore, uh, to celebrate the good country music coming from WTCR.

speaker: Clint
lines: That’s it! Yeah, giant cow costume.

speaker: Griffin
lines: There are some holes cut in the- cut in the uh- the- uh, crate that you guys are inside of, letting in beams of sunlight in, uh, and there’s also a significant amount of dust coming in. You get the idea that there is wind whipping up kind of, uh, a light dust storm outside. And as the beams of light start shining in you, you know that the sun has rose, uh, and then your crate stops moving and you hear a flurry of activity outside. You hear engines revving, you hear war cries, you hear singing, you hear, uh, some- some deep-voiced laughter, uhh, and then you hear a loud horn. [Horn SFX] And uh, and Hurley says

speaker: Hurley
lines: Ready yourselves, when you hear the second horn, that’s when we’re going. Remember we got 15 opponents, but all we have to do is beat Sloane. Do you guys have any last words?

speaker: Merle
lines: [sighs] Um, yeah-
